name: DragLITE
description:
The lite version of Drag racing reaction time practice now on the iPhone and iTouch! Full statistics and instructions are available in the full version of the app, DragPRO. Fully configurable in this version:

- Full or Pro tree
- 1 or 2 players
- practice alone or against another player
- perfect RT of 0.000 or traditional 0.400/0.500

Additional configurable in the full version DragPRO:
- play against iPhone with 5 levels of expertise
- play against a preset RT
- transbrake (lift) or gas pedal (press) start modes
- single game or Best-of-7 series
- settable rollout
- settable or random dial-ins
